members.name: IGNORE
members.comment: Action indicating that a coding error is to be handled by dropping the erroneous input and resuming the coding operation.

members.name: REPLACE
members.comment: Action indicating that a coding error is to be handled by dropping the erroneous input, appending the coder's replacement value to the output buffer, and resuming the coding operation.

members.name: REPORT
members.comment: Action indicating that a coding error is to be reported, either by returning a CoderResult object or by throwing a CharacterCodingException, whichever is appropriate for the method implementing the coding process.

members.name: toString
members.comment: Returns a string describing this action.

name: java.nio.charset.CodingErrorAction
comment:
A typesafe enumeration for coding-error actions.

Instances of this class are used to specify how malformed-input and unmappable-character errors are to be handled by charset decoders and encoders.
